DOC.brief_summary: The Zenith® Low Profile AAA Endovascular Graft Clinical Study clinical trial approve US FDA study safety effectiveness Zenith® Low Profile AAA Endovascular Graft treat abdominal aortic , aorto-iliac , iliac aneurysm .
DOC.brief_title: Zenith ( R ) Low Profile AAA Endovascular Graft Clinical Study
DOC.criteria: Abdominal aortic , aortoiliac , iliac aneurysm appropriate size Vessels suitable endovascular access aneurysm repair Less 18 year age Inability refusal give inform consent Disease consideration would compromise patient safety study outcomes Unsuitable arterial anatomy
